turns.speaker: client
turns.text: hey my lovely assistant i need my regular from starbucks please!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: will it be at the regular south side spot we use?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: YES, it will be at the battlefield mall location.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i get the address for GPS just in case?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: of course its 2825 S. Glenstone ave .

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: oh ok this is the place i go every other week!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes hun its very easy to find.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: please go ahead and grab me a tall today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and do you want the iced caramel macchiato like last time?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes please, this is what i will get on most days

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of milk do you want in it today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: i will take whole milk today please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok and any extra toppings today mam?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes i think i would like extra whip cream on it today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes lets top it off with an extra shot of espresso!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: alright if that will be ill ad this order!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok sounds great i'm very much needing this. Thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your drink is on order at the star bucks store in the battlefield mall on Glenstone ave, and will be ready for pickup shortly and that your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: awesome thank you so much hun. goodbye

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm here to help anytime goodbye mam!
